quest.name: The Gift of Joy (The Lavender Beds)
journal:
The saint's little helper in the Lavender Beds seeks your assistance in running the Starlight Celebration festivities.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

You have volunteered your services to assist with the Starlight Celebration festivities. Pull on your Starlight tunic, and collect a child's message from one of the Starlight sentinels found within the Lavender Beds.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
You have collected a letter to the Spinner. Return to Yainu-Par and deliver the message to the saint's little helper.
You have delivered the message to the grateful little helper. Take the gift from the festival volunteer, and hand it to the child waiting nearby.
You have performed your duty as a little helper, and brought gift-wrapped happiness to a child. Report to the saint's little helper in Yainu-Par.
The volunteer is pleased with your efforts, and looks forward to your continuing assistance during the remainder of the Starlight Celebration.
objectives: Equip the Starlight tunic and collect a letter to the Spinner from a Starlight sentinel.
Deliver the letter to the Spinner to the saint's little helper.
Equip the Starlight tunic and deliver the lucky star to the waiting youngling.
Report to the saint's little helper.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Filled with the spirit of giving, are we? Let's set you to your task, then.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: All you need to do is collect a single child's message from one of the Starlight sentinels within the Lavender Beds...all while wearing your Starlight tunic, of course.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: As you know, there is the tree we helpers set up here in Yainu-Par, but there are also decorated sentinels to be found in the gardens of your fellow adventurers' estates.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: You should also know that the type of fallen star you receive for your efforts will depend on the sentinel from which the message is retrieved.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Did we talk about fallen stars? It's a simple system we devised to reward hardworking volunteers─a type of festive currency that can be exchanged for seasonal goods. Speak with the Starlight crier if you'd like to know more!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The position of Starlight sentinels will be displayed on your minimap. Search the residential area to pinpoint their locations!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can only obtain one seasonal message at a time, so choose your sentinel wisely! Keep in mind which fallen stars are needed to purchase the seasonal goods you wish to acquire.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Pray bring me a message from any of the Starlight sentinels found within the Lavender Beds. Oh, and don't forget to don your scarlet apparel!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The position of Starlight sentinels will be displayed on your minimap. Search the residential area to pinpoint their locations!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can only obtain one seasonal message at a time, so choose your sentinel wisely! Keep in mind which fallen stars are needed to purchase the seasonal goods you wish to acquire.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must have the Starlight tunic equipped to continue with this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you have misplaced your Starlight tunic, speak with a Starlight Celebration crier to receive a replacement.

dialogue.name: GUIDE65783
dialogue.text: You've lost your Starlight tunic? Never fear! We've enough spares to dress a small army! Here, take another one!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You obtain a Starlight tunic.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Hello again! You've returned with one of the children's messages, I trust?

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Excellent. Now comes the fun part! Take this gift, and deliver it to the waiting youngling. Remember: the wee ones expect someone dressed as a little helper!

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: You should find an expectant child waiting nearby. Don't forget to dress the part!

dialogue.name: CHILDA65783
dialogue.text: A little helper! Yay! Do you have my present!? Can I have my present now!?

dialogue.name: CHILDA65783
dialogue.text:
I got a pre-sent!♪
A present from the go-ddess!♪
Thank you, little helper!

dialogue.name: CHILDB65783
dialogue.text: Excuse me, miss little helpermister little helper... I was told to wait here for my present...

dialogue.name: CHILDB65783
dialogue.text: ...Can I really have this? Thank you so much!

dialogue.name: CHILDC65783
dialogue.text: Wow, are you really a little helper? Well, I've been good this year, so is it okay if I get my gift now...?

dialogue.name: CHILDC65783
dialogue.text: Thank you! I'll be sure not to play too rough...

dialogue.name: CHILDA65783
dialogue.text: I'm waiting here for the little helper to bring my present! I wonder what's taking so long...

dialogue.name: CHILDB65783
dialogue.text: Have you seen a little helper anywhere? Maybe they forgot about me...

dialogue.name: CHILDC65783
dialogue.text: If I wait right here, a little helper is supposed to bring me a gift. That's what they said...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must have the Starlight tunic equipped to continue with this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you have misplaced your Starlight tunic, speak with a Starlight Celebration crier to receive a replacement.

dialogue.name: GUIDE65783
dialogue.text: You've lost your Starlight tunic? Never fear! We've enough spares to dress a small army! Here, take another one!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You obtain a Starlight tunic.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: You've returned to me empty-handed. Good! I do hope the youngling enjoys the gift!

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: Amh Garanjy does so dearly love to see the children smile. When I once marveled at her dedication, the celebrant explained that her fervor grew from her troubled past as an orphan.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: She would spare any child the misery and loneliness she experienced, even if it meant funding the entire Starlight Celebration by washing dirty dishes at the Carline Canopy for a year.

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: And I must admit, her intensity is quite contagious! I assume you must feel it too, otherwise why else would you find yourself compelled to help us again and again?

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: I believe I heard the delighted laughter from here! Good show, little helper! I hope I can count on your assistance again in the future!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have contributed to the Starlight Celebration in every residential district! Report to Amh Garanjy in the Lavender Beds.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VOLUNTEER65783
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）
